title: [K-12] Online Scenario-Based Parenting Skills Training Program for Parents of At-Risk Adolescents

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Adolescent Defiant Behavior and Basic Parenting Skills
context.additional_context: Blended education combining asynchronous e-learning with face-to-face workshops in smartphone-centric restricted technology environments

learning_goals: Learners will select and explain appropriate parenting strategies in response to diverse conflict scenarios.
Learners will apply self-efficacy enhancement techniques to improve adolescent behavior in real-life situations.
Learners will maintain and evaluate a consistent positive discipline style over 30 days.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
